# Bipolar Junction Transistor ( BJT)

<span style="color:#336600">Collector Curve Characteristics:</span>

A set of  _collector characteristic curves _ can be generated that show how the collector current\,  _I_ C\, varies with the collector\-to\-emitter voltage\,  _V_ CE\, for specified values of base current\,  _I_ B\.

Note in the circuit diagram that both  _V_ BB and  _V_ CC are variable sources of voltage\.
